uberEatsHint.title: How to find your ID
uberEatsHint.step1: Log in to your <0>Uber Eats Restaurant Manager</0>
uberEatsHint.step2: The UUID is mentioned in the URL. The example is as below: <0/> https://restaurant.uber.com/home/<1>be77dfif-49e5-4a96-y234-98f6f55af43d</1>
uberEatsHint.ifDoesntWork: If you can't find it or if it doesn't work, please contact us at <0>support@foodetective.co</0>

emptyWholesalers.title: Oops, it seems like your supplier is not yet listed on our platform...
emptyWholesalers.description: No worries: just send us the name & website of the supplier you'd like to see here at <0>support@foodetective.co</0> and we’ll add it as soon as possible.

connectPartner: Please enter the credentials you usually use to connect on {{name}} back office:
connectPartnerNote: <0>Note:</0> for your security, these credentials will automatically be deleted from our system as soon as the integration is finished or at latest two week after the integration request.
bookMeeting: If you don’t want to share these information, please book an <0>online meeting</0> with us to do the integration together.
